item.text: Functional abilities and goals - admission [CMS Assessment]
Eating - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Oral hygiene - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Toileting hygiene - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Shower/bathe self - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Not attempted due to medical condition or safety concerns

item.text: Upper body dressing - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Partial/moderate assistance - Helper does less than half the effort. Helper lifts, holds or supports trunk or limbs, but provides less than half the effort.

item.text: Lower body dressing - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.

item.text: Putting on/taking off footwear - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]

valueCoding.display: Substantial/maximal assistance - Helper does more than half the effort. Helper lifts or holds trunk or limbs and provides more than half the effort.
